duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional and meaningful customer service to promote products and build brand relationships.
Assist the management team in building store business.
Support service enhancements to build strong relationships, including active use of Concierge.
Handle multiple customers at a time, multi-task, and take on projects simultaneously.
Stay informed about fashion trends, new arrivals, and product knowledge such as fit, color, and fashion.
Use fashion expertise to create outfits for customers and suggest items to meet their needs.
Maximize individual performance by participating in learning opportunities and accepting direction, coaching, and feedback.
Achieve sales and service metrics in key measurable areas, including clientelling/outreach, appointment setting, and Talbots Classic Awards.
Complete assigned projects, including operational tasks such as filling orders, replenishment, and recovery.
